name: hoonicorn.lol
description: HOONI is the first Uniswap V4 token on UniChain, offering innovative token launching and multi-chain wallet tracking solutions with permanent liquidity locking. Explore our upcoming NFT collection! We set out to build something different - a protocol that combines the wild energy of degen culture with rock-solid security and innovative tokenomics. Unichain represents our vision of what DeFi can be: profitable, fun, and safe. Our mission is simple: create the most degenerate yet secure DeFi ecosystem in crypto.
